lead_paragraph: Yesterday afternoon, about 2 1/2 o'clock, the bell of the Monumental Engine Company commenced tolling in a very rapid manner, and a cry of fire was raised, which, however, was corrected in a few minutes by the statement that the prisoners Whittaker and MeKenzie had been taken out of the county jail by some members of the Vigilance Committee.

headline.main: Seizure and Execution of Whittaker and McKeuzle by the Vigilance Committee; From the Alta California. THE RESCUE.

abstract: Action of San Francisco Vigce. Committee
